content: You are absolutely right Tom. That’s a poor choice of words on my behalf, as ‘better’ does suggest a hierarchy of behaviour which isn’t what I really meant, nor to deny that ‘celebrated’ people are also questioning their existence. I wanted the sentence to back up what I had previously said regarding the deaths of these ‘celebrated’ people and it really should have read something like ‘With this in mind we should be encouraged to go beyond the body…’ Thanks for your feedback.
